pr_title: Return stats from each block management task

timeline.message: Return a report from each management task

timeline.bodyText:
@calvinjia
What do you think about making this log INFO level?
It would only print when a management task actually ran.
At the worst this would print every 10 seconds when;

BackoffStrategy is DIRECTORY
Tiers don't align
AlignTask can't make progress (due to failures or heavy load)

I prefer this over crafting an admin report because the latter can't provide information for a full range without persistence at worker/master. I think this would be sufficient until at least we stabilize worker management infra.
timeline.author: ggezer

replies.bodyText: I think that's fine, we can also add a template to raise the log level of this class if it is too noisy.
replies.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText: Cool. I don't think it will be noisy. I will watch for a while though.
replies.author: ggezer
